stimulusHtml: The acceleration of a particle moving along the x-axis at time t is given by  a ( t ) = 6 t − 2 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@3DB4@ . If the velocity is 25 when t=3 and the position is 10 when t=1, then the position x(t)=
